name: net-go
description: script runner and elm dep setup

scripts.start: npm run make-elm && npm run make-css && go run main.go
scripts.test: npm run test-go && npm run test-elm
scripts.format: npm run format-elm ; npm run format-go
scripts.make: npm run make-elm ; npm run make-go ; npm run make-css
scripts.make-elm-prod: npm run make-elm-main -- --optimize && npm run make-elm-worker -- --optimize && npm run make-elm-minify
